short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Store bits and pieces of your resume and other important links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: StashIt is a simple portfolio management app designed specifically for job applicants to streamline the process of organizing and accessing essential details for their career search. Whether you're actively seeking new opportunities or simply maintaining an up-to-date record of your professional information, StashIt provides a user-friendly interface and robust features to help you stay organized and focused on landing your dream job.
